title: Oistins Branch (Temporarily Closed)
description: The Oistins Branch library is located in Scarborough House in the historic town of Oistins in Christ Church. Known for its fishing industry and exciting night-life, Oistins is the perfect place for a library serving both visitors and residents alike. One can sit and enjoy the peaceful surroundings while reading a book or magazine, or make full use of our services which include photocopying and free Wi-Fi and Internet service and access to EBSCO online database which contains e-books journals, newspapers and magazines, children and adult lending services and a weekly story-hour. Our regular hours are Monday to Friday 10:30 a.m. to 1:00 p.m. and 2:00 p.m. to 6:00 p.m., and Saturday 9 a.m. to 1:00 p.m.
